definitions.definition: To set up ; to organize ; to put into an orderly sequence or arrangement.
To plan; to prepare in advance.
examples: to arrange to meet;   to arrange for supper

definitions.definition: To prepare and adapt an already-written composition for presentation in other than its original form.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To set up ; to organize ; to put into an orderly sequence or arrangement.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , intransitive ) To plan; to prepare in advance.
( music , transitive , intransitive ) To prepare and adapt an already-written composition for presentation in other than its original form.
